trans-unit.source: PottyMouth is designed to handle input text from non-technical, potentially careless or malicious users. It produces HTML that is completely safe, programmatically and visually, to include on any web page. And you don’t need to make your users read any instructions before they start typing. They don’t even need to know that PottyMouth is being used.
trans-unit.target: PottyMouth is designed to handle input text from non-technical, potentially careless or malicious users. It produces HTML that is completely safe, programmatically and visually, to include on any web page. And you don’t need to make your users read any instructions before they start typing. They don’t even need to know that PottyMouth is being used.

trans-unit.source: PottyMouth transforms completely unstructured and untrusted text to valid, nice-looking, completely safe XHTML.
trans-unit.target: PottyMouth преобразует полностью неструктурированный и непроверенный текст в корректный,красивый,абсолютно безопасный XHTML.

trans-unit.source: transform unstructured, untrusted text to safe, valid XHTML
trans-unit.target: преобразовывать неструктурированный,недоверенный текст в безопасный,действительный XHTML
